class.name: MannWhitneyUTestTest

javadoc.text: Test cases for the MannWhitneyUTestImpl class.

method.name: testMannWhitneyUSimple
method.comment: Target values computed using R version 2.11.1 x <- c(19, 22, 16, 29, 24) y <- c(20, 11, 17, 12) wilcox.test(x, y, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 0, paired = FALSE, exact = FALSE, correct = FALSE) W = 17, p-value = 0.08641

method.name: testMannWhitneyUInputValidation
method.comment: Samples must be present, i.e. length > 0
